verses.verse: Come near, <WH7126> ye nations, <WH1471> to hear; <WH8085> and hearken, <WH7181> ye people: <WH3816> let the earth <WH776> hear, <WH8085> and all that is therein; <WH4393> the world, <WH8398> and all things <WH3605> that come forth <WH6631> of it.

For <WH3588> the indignation <WH7110> of the LORD <WH3068> is upon <WH5921> all <WH3605> nations, <WH1471> and his fury <WH2534> upon <WH5921> all <WH3605> their armies: <WH6635> he hath utterly destroyed <WH2763> them, he hath delivered <WH5414> them to the slaughter. <WH2874>

Their slain <WH2491> also shall be cast out, <WH7993> and their stink <WH889> shall come up <WH5927> out of their carcasses, <WH6297> and the mountains <WH2022> shall be melted <WH4549> with their blood. <WH4480> <WH1818>

And all <WH3605> the host <WH6635> of heaven <WH8064> shall be dissolved, <WH4743> and the heavens <WH8064> shall be rolled together <WH1556> as a scroll: <WH5612> and all <WH3605> their host <WH6635> shall fall down, <WH5034> as the leaf <WH5929> falleth off <WH5034> from the vine, <WH4480> <WH1612> and as a falling <WH5034> fig from the fig tree. <WH4480> <WH8384>

For <WH3588> my sword <WH2719> shall be bathed <WH7301> in heaven: <WH8064> behold, <WH2009> it shall come down <WH3381> upon <WH5921> Idumea, <WH123> and upon <WH5921> the people <WH5971> of my curse, <WH2764> to judgment. <WH4941>

The sword <WH2719> of the LORD <WH3068> is filled <WH4390> with blood, <WH1818> it is made fat <WH1878> with fatness, <WH4480> <WH2459> and with the blood <WH4480> <WH1818> of lambs <WH3733> and goats, <WH6260> with the fat <WH4480> <WH2459> of the kidneys <WH3629> of rams: <WH352> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath a sacrifice <WH2077> in Bozrah, <WH1224> and a great <WH1419> slaughter <WH2874> in the land <WH776> of Idumea. <WH123>

And the unicorns <WH7214> shall come down <WH3381> with <WH5973> them, and the bullocks <WH6499> with <WH5973> the bulls; <WH47> and their land <WH776> shall be soaked <WH7301> with blood, <WH4480> <WH1818> and their dust <WH6083> made fat <WH1878> with fatness. <WH4480> <WH2459>
For <WH3588> it is the day <WH3117> of the LORD's <WH3068> vengeance, <WH5359> and the year <WH8141> of recompenses <WH7966> for the controversy <WH7379> of Zion. <WH6726>

And the streams <WH5158> thereof shall be turned <WH2015> into pitch, <WH2203> and the dust <WH6083> thereof into brimstone, <WH1614> and the land <WH776> thereof shall become <WH1961> burning <WH1197> pitch. <WH2203>

It shall not <WH3808> be quenched <WH3518> night <WH3915> nor day; <WH3119> the smoke <WH6227> thereof shall go up <WH5927> forever: <WH5769> from generation <WH4480> <WH1755> to generation <WH1755> it shall lie waste; <WH2717> none <WH369> shall pass through <WH5674> it forever <WH5331> and ever. <WH5331>

But the cormorant <WH6893> and the bittern <WH7090> shall possess <WH3423> it; the owl <WH3244> also and the raven <WH6158> shall dwell <WH7931> in it: and he shall stretch out <WH5186> upon <WH5921> it the line <WH6957> of confusion, <WH8414> and the stones <WH68> of emptiness. <WH922>
They shall call <WH7121> the nobles <WH2715> thereof to the kingdom, <WH4410> but none <WH369> shall be there, <WH8033> and all <WH3605> her princes <WH8269> shall be <WH1961> nothing. <WH657>

And thorns <WH5518> shall come up <WH5927> in her palaces, <WH759> nettles <WH7057> and brambles <WH2336> in the fortresses <WH4013> thereof: and it shall be <WH1961> a habitation <WH5116> of dragons, <WH8565> and a court <WH2681> for owls. <WH1323> <WH3284>

The wild beasts of the desert <WH6728> shall also meet <WH6298> with <WH854> the wild beasts of the island, <WH338> and the satyr <WH8163> shall cry <WH7121> to <WH5921> his fellow; <WH7453> the screech owl <WH3917> also <WH389> shall rest <WH7280> there, <WH8033> and find <WH4672> for herself a place of rest. <WH4494>

There <WH8033> shall the great owl <WH7091> make her nest, <WH7077> and lay, <WH4422> and hatch, <WH1234> and gather <WH1716> under her shadow: <WH6738> there <WH8033> shall the vultures <WH1772> also <WH389> be gathered, <WH6908> every one <WH802> with her mate. <WH7468>

Seek <WH1875> ye out of <WH4480> <WH5921> the book <WH5612> of the LORD, <WH3068> and read: <WH7121> no <WH3808> one <WH259> of these <WH4480> <WH2007> shall fail, <WH5737> none <WH3808> <WH802> shall want <WH6485> her mate: <WH7468> for <WH3588> my mouth <WH6310> it <WH1931> hath commanded, <WH6680> and his spirit <WH7307> it <WH1931> hath gathered <WH6908> them.

And he <WH1931> hath cast <WH5307> the lot <WH1486> for them, and his hand <WH3027> hath divided <WH2505> it unto them by line: <WH6957> they shall possess <WH3423> it forever, <WH5704> <WH5769> from generation <WH1755> to generation <WH1755> shall they dwell <WH7931> therein.
